reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater stylish and comfortable, with a true-to-size fit and lightweight, soft fabric. They appreciate its quality, with one customer noting it's a high-quality tight knit, and they like its colors, particularly the true red shade.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!
items.body: This is a very nice flattering top that looks great with work slacks or a skirt for a more professional look for the office or it can be dressed down with a pair of jeans! The color is a beautiful green! The fit is true to size. The length is perfect. The puff on the sleeves are just at the point where I can wear it feeling comfortable and confident. The material is very soft. Very nice top! Read more
items.author: maggie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect top!!!
items.body: This is a lightweight top and the quality is AMAZING for the price. The fabric is very soft and the style is super cute. Red is the perfect color for the fall and warm enough to wear without getting too hot. Read more
items.author: Katie Mealor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant looking!
items.body: Love the way it fit, color and material thickness quality fit my expectation comfortable to wear all day long. Read more
items.author: Arriola Villa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sleeves are HUGE!!
items.body: I was so excited when I tried on this sweater. The fabric feels great. It’s super soft. It is fitted and flattering. I sized up to a large and it fits perfectly. I was so excited!! Was already planning my purchase of the other colors!! Like a great quality. Then I went and looked in the mirror!?!?! Omg the sleeves are huge! I couldn’t get it to really come across in the pictures, but it literally makes my upper arms and body twice the width if that makes any sense. If you put the width of my arms together, it would be the width of my body. It looks ridiculous in person. It’s literally my only complaint and if I knew how to fix it on my own, I might do that, but I’m not sure if there’s anything I could do to make it better. If you pull the sleeves down, they do get more streamline looking, but they just ride back up again. I’m gonna return it because I can’t wear this which is so disappointing because it’s so cute and it feels so nice!! I will admit I have many many many many short sleeve sweaters with the puffy sleeve. It is definitely a style that I’m used to, but none are this large. Read more
items.author: Carolyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great work top
items.body: Great shirt for work. Great quality and true to size. This is a nice sweater for casual work days but still has a professional look. I have it in multiple colors. It’s not a thick material so it’s good to wear in any weather. Read more
items.author: AW

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for the working girls!
items.body: Super soft material and I love the fit. Wears perfectly to the office with a pair of work slacks. It was true to size and the color is gorgeous! A staple piece for office wear! Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful BUT sleeves are too puffy
items.body: BEAUTIFUL material and cut, correct sizing, length is perfect BUT sleeves are waaayyy too puffy. In fashion "bigger is better" seldom works. I was so sad to return this shirt since it is really good quality and nautical pattern is very "in" for this season. Oh well... Read more
items.author: nv

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great closet must have!
items.body: I love the feel and the fit of this sweater. It's lightweight and even though it's sort of form fitting, it's not tight or snug. It's soft and stretchy. Could be worn year round actually. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Davis

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Green White Edge, Red Heart, Apricot, Purple Red, Black, Coffee, Black Flower, Orange, Beige Strip, Black White Edge, Deep Blue, Apricot White Edge, Navy White Edge, Grey Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
